meterBoxId = #{epuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meter_name = #{ammeterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meter_no = #{ammeterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: SELECT row_id as epu_id, epu_name FROM view_epu_info WHERE epu_type = 'M0004' and epu_district= #{epuDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY epu_name
